All Classes

Class Description
CheckValidInput
General class to check for valid input across project
ChooseRouteScreen
Represents a ChooseRouteScreen class.
CmdLineUi
Represents Command Line UI for playing 'Island Trader' game
CoreOptionsScreen
Represents the screen for high level interaction with the "Island Trader" game Displays the current progress of the game.
GameEnvironment
Represents the game environment of an 'Island Trader' game.
GameOverScreen
Represents a a screen for the event of Game Over for a user.
GameUi
Interface for ui classes for Island trader
Gui
Represent the core operating class for the GUI for Island Trader
Island
Represents an Island object
Item
Represents an Item object
Main
The entry point to the program, creates instances of the classes required to start the game, then handles control to the c lass for the desired ui.
MakePaymentsDialog
Dialog for making payments before traveling on a Route to another Island
Pirates
Represents a pirates random event
PirateScreen
Represents a Pirates random event
Player
Represents an Player object
RescuedSailors
Represents a RescuedSailors random event
RescueScreen
Represents a screen for a rescued sailors random event
Route
Class that models and provides information about a route between two islands.
SailingScreen
Represents a screen for Sailing between two islands
Screen
Represents a Screen object for GUI
SetupScreen
Represents a SetupScreen Used to set up a game, getting the starting conditions, then passes flow over to a CoreOptionsScreen object
Ship
Represents a ship
ShipUpgrade
Represents a Ship Upgrade
Store
Represents a Store object
UnfortunateWeather
Represents an unfortunate weather random event
ViewIslandsScreen
Represents a screen for viewing Islands that a user can travel to from their current Island
VisitStoreScreen
Represents a Screen that a user can interact within "Island Trader" in order to do operations with a Store
WeatherScreen
Represents a Random Weather event
